tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE authorized_telecom_operators (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    operator_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    permit_number VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    license_expiry DATE
)

CREATE TABLE permits (
    permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    permit_number VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    permit_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    issue_date DATE,
    expiry_date DATE
);
